name: Cthulhu's Village
description:
Cthulhu's Village:

This is a game where you play as a stranger to a village after their car breaks down. You must go through the village and either fix your car or find out what happened to its inhabitants. This game has 3 endings.

To talk to NPCs, you have to click more than once.

All photos used for this were made by me in bitsy or drawn by me in photoshop. This game has no sound. All text and story is original, although inspiration was drawn from works from H.P. Lovecraft's cosmic horror (Cthulhu is public domain).
